All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Actor
    Actor is a basis common for all entities that can build or store or act on the board in any way shape or form.
    BorderLabel
    This class exists exclusively to be styled in css.
    Building
    Building represents an actual building.
    BuildingsEditorController
    Controller class for the Buildings Editor.
    BuildingTemplate
    Used to generate new buildings.
    CompactGridPane
    This class exists exclusively to be styled in css.
    Configuration
    Determines the configuration of the program, currently chosen Ruleset and default values for gfx files.
    Configurator
    Non Instantiable configurator class that is responsible for loading, and storing the Configuration of the program.
    ConversionFetcher<T,​C>
    An interface for a visual fetcher that uses JavaFX to display a selection of instances of C before returning an instance of T on request.
    ConversionMaterialFetcher
    Implementation of a ConversionFetcher that generates a new instance Material based on a user selected VisualMaterialTemplate it uses TableView to display items provided to it in its initialize method.
    DarkerHBox
    This class exists exclusively to be styled in css.
    DarkerVBox
    This class exists exclusively to be styled in css.
    DownfallLaunch
    A simple class whose only purpose is to have a main method which calls the actual main method of the program This enables building of jars that will properly include and reference the javaFX runtime components
    DownfallMain
    Main application class of Downfall.
    DownfallMainController
    Controller for the main GUI of Downfall EAM.
    DownfallUtil
    Utility Class of the application.
    ExitButton
    Button that closes the stage that is provided to it, on action.
    Fetcher<T>
    A simple interface for any class that returns an instance of T on request
    HighlightPane
    This class exists exclusively to be styled in css.
    ImageChooserButton
    JavaFX Button that creates a FileChooser on action.
    LogoTableColumn<S>
    a JavaFX TableColumn that displays an image for each row that corresponds to pathname of this cell's String value
    Material
    Represents a bundle of materials, like 30 Wood or 15 Stone.
    MaterialsEditorController
    Controller class for the Materials Editor.
    MaterialTemplate
    Used to generate new materials.
    MaximizeButton
    Button that maximizes the stage that is provided to it on action if it isn't maximized already.
    MinimizeButton
    Button that iconifies (minimizes) the stage that is provided to it on action.
    PathRelativisor
    Relativizes path to an executable path, a given path or a file.
    PromptLabel
    This class exists exclusively to be styled in css.
    Realm
    Realm is a data model class that represents an actor who possesses diplomatic attributes and is capable of having characters in its court.
    RealmEditorController
    Controller class for the Realm Editor.
    RealmScreenController
    A controller that controls the content of the Realm Tab.
    Rules
    Contains reference to a user defined Ruleset.
    Savegame
    a Save class that holds the information about a user's Realm and the Ruleset on which the Realm was created.
    SaveManager
    Interface for any class responsible for loading, saving and keeping track of the last location to which the last load or to which last save was done.
    SimpleBuildingTemplateFetcher
    Simple implementation of Fetcher class that returns a new instance of VisualBuildingTemplate on request
    SimpleMaterialTemplateFetcher
    Simple implementation of Fetcher class that returns a new instance of VisualMaterialTemplate on request
    SimpleSaveManager
    Simple implementation of save manager that uses the Configurator class to store the LastSavegamePathname.
    SimpleTableEditor<T>
    JavaFX GUI element that contains a table, content of which can be edited with add and remove actions.
    SimpleTagFetcher
    Simple implementation of Fetcher class that returns a new instance of Tag on request
    StabilityPane
    This class exists exclusively to be styled in css.
    StageControlButton
    A type of button that controls a JavaFX Stage state.
    StageController
    Interface for every JavaFX FXML controller that controls an entire Stage.
    TableFetcherBase<T>
    Base for all Fetchers that feature some kind of a table from which a selection is made.
    Tag
    A Tag is a String value that can be applied to Actors.
    TagsEditorController
    Controller class for the Materials Editor.
    TitleLabel
    This class exists exclusively to be styled in css.
    VisualBuildingTemplate
    Template that is used when new buildings are generated.
    VisualFetcher<T>
    An interface for a visual fetcher that uses JavaFX to display a selection of instances of T before returning an instance of T on request
    VisualMaterialTemplate
    Template that is used when new materials are generated.
    VisualTagFetcher
    Implementation of a VisualFetcher that returns a Tag selected in the Table it uses TableView to display items provided to it in its initialize method.
